title: Aizul
data:
{{version|026}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Aizul the Neglectful Guardian''' is a very fast [[unique]] [[guardian serpent]] capable of deadly [[Poison Magic]] and a [[Hexes|Hex]] which can put you to sleep for several turns. Although not very dangerous in melee, she can deal huge amounts of [[poison]] damage to those without resistance and has much more durability than most monsters at her depth.

==Location==
*[[The Depths]]:1-3
*The [[Elven Halls]]
*[[The Swamp]]
*[[The Snake Pit]]
*[[The Shoals]]
*The [[Spider's Nest]]
*[[The Vaults]]:1-4
*[[The Crypt]]:1

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Melee attacks against you will deal extra damage while asleep. Taking any damage (including poison damage) will wake you up, however.
*[[Poison resistance]] and high [[willpower]] are highly recommended, and even with poison resistance, expect to take decent damage from her Poison Arrows. If you lack either, definitely consider fleeing this fight until you're better prepared.
*Aizul has no arms, and thus cannot open [[door]]s. Use this to make escaping much easier.
